expertise.title: Multi-channel prospecting
expertise.description: In-depth lead qualification, event-driven acceleration plans, contract negotiation and conclusion, key account follow-up and opening of new territories.

expertise.title: Reduced sales costs
expertise.description: Instant adaptation of resources to market fluctuations, access to experienced talent without recruitment delays, and operational deployment in a matter of weeks.

expertise.title: When is it relevant?
expertise.description: SMEs lacking time, budget or expertise. Technology companies needing to convert innovation into sales. Companies in export or expansion phase. Established groups benchmarking internal performance.
